content: ***this is a listing for a pdf printable pattern not a finished product**** make your own sweet llama ornament with this easy to follow crochet pattern with step by step tutorial and photos to help along the way this pattern is worked in the round with the body and head as one piece you will want to be familiar with using a magic_ring and invisible decreases you can find more tips plus the free version of this pattern on my blog graceandyarn com finished product measures approximately 4 5 inches tall skill level easy/intermediate - this is a beginner friendly pattern with some sewing of parts materials - size 4 worsted weight yarn 65 yards of white small amount of brown and choice of color for scarf yarn or twine to hang ornament approx 6 inches long 3 5 mm crochet hook 9mm safety eyes crochet/embroidery thread for eyelashes/eyebrows/nose/cheeks scissors tapestry needle stuffing stitch markers abbreviations - us terminology mc- magic_ring single_crochet- single_crochet single_crochet increase- single_crochet increase half_double_crochet half_double_crochet inv decrease- invisible decrease st s - stitch es repeat repeat chain chain you may make items to sell gift or donate with this pattern if you sell online please provide a link back to my website for credit as the designer www graceandyarn com you may not sell make copies or share the actual pattern thank you these patterns and more are available for free on my blog at www graceandyarn com this listing is for an ad-free printable version with a full photo tutorial thank you so much for stopping by
